DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : AUSTRALIA
DOC.TEXT: Coal_Miners Strike : About 20 # 000 Australian coal_miners have begun an indefinite strike at 130 mines in two states to protest cuts_in the prices and volume of coal sold to Japanese steel_mills , national radio reported . The strike is the second walkout since the industry accepted an average 8.4 % cut_in coal prices and reduced shipments to Japan for the fiscal_year beginning April 1 .
